items.sentence: Because of a misunderstanding, Tom and Mary haven't spoken to each other now for a month.
Tom looked away in horror as Mary doused her fries with mayonnaise on top of the ketchup.
Tom shot himself with the tranquilizer that was meant for the bear that was on the loose.
I really admire Tom's ability to focus on his work, no matter what's going on around him.
Sooner or later, we'll have to buy a new TV since the TV we have now is a very old model.
